title: Repeals part O3 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003 relating to decoupling from certain federal depreciation provisions
summary: Relates to decoupling from certain federal depreciation provisions.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3796

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. MOLINARO -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Ways and Means

       AN  ACT to repeal Part O3 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003 amending the
         tax law relating  to  decoupling  from  certain  federal  depreciation
         provisions

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Part O3 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003 amending the  tax
    2  law  relating to decoupling from certain federal depreciation provisions
    3  is REPEALED.
    4    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08274-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to repeal Part O3 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003 amending the tax law relating to decoupling from certain federal depreciation provisions
